recommendations.title: Implement Azure Key Vault and Secret Rotation
recommendations.description: Move all sensitive secrets (service-to-service credentials, API keys, database passwords) from Kubernetes secrets and environment variables to Azure Key Vault. Automate rotation for secrets, configure managed access policies, and enforce audit logging. This directly mitigates risk of credential exposure and supports PCI-DSS/SOC2 compliance.

recommendations.title: Establish Robust Network Segmentation and Enable Network Security Controls
recommendations.description: Segregate workloads into dedicated namespaces per team and service function. Implement Kubernetes network policies to restrict east-west traffic. Deploy Azure Firewall for outbound filtering, and replace public AKS access with private endpoints. Add Application Gateway/WAF for ingress. This reduces the attack surface and prevents lateral movement during a breach.

recommendations.title: Integrate Microsoft Defender for Containers and Mandatory Vulnerability Scanning in Pipelines
recommendations.description: Enable Microsoft Defender for Containers on AKS and Azure Container Registry to detect threats in real-time. Integrate automated image vulnerability scanning (including outdated dependencies, base images, and misconfigurations) in CI/CD pipelines. Pin Docker image versions and remediate deprecated APIs. This prevents supply-chain attacks, increases workload hardening and code security.

recommendations.title: Implement Data Classification, Encryption, and Compliance Policies
recommendations.description: Label and classify all data stores containing PII and payment data. Enforce encryption at rest using customer-managed keys (CMK) for Cosmos DB, SQL Database, and Redis. Assign Azure Policy for PCI-DSS/SOC 2 baseline enforcement and audit compliance regularly. This remediates regulatory gaps and mitigates data breach impacts.

recommendations.title: Define and Drill Incident Response and Disaster Recovery Plans
recommendations.description: Document incident response runbooks with clear severity triage, contacts, and escalation workflows. Implement automated backups for all stateful resources and test restore procedures quarterly. Set up multi-region disaster recovery for business-critical services. These actions ensure business continuity and timely recovery from security incidents.

recommendations.title: Enforce Least Privilege RBAC and Conditional Access Policies
recommendations.description: Apply role segregation by removing cluster-admin access from developers, defining custom Azure RBAC and Kubernetes roles per team. Integrate Microsoft Entra Workload ID for microservices and enforce conditional access (MFA, geographic restrictions). Periodically audit and rotate non-human identities. This prevents privilege escalation and unauthorized access.
